description: Weekly quizzes on Möbius covering Statistics and Numerical Methods components. Includes revision quizzes after classes and unlimited attempts with highest mark counted. Split equally between Statistics (10%) and Numerical Methods (10%).
Week 7 test on Möbius assessing descriptive statistics, probability, estimators, and sample mean inferences from weeks 1-5 content.
Two tests (Weeks 5 and 9) on Möbius evaluating Topics 1-3 (weeks 1-4) and Topics 4-6 (weeks 4-8). Each test contributes 5% to the final grade.
2-hour exam via Möbius during the exam period, equally weighted on statistics and numerical methods, covering all course content.
